extendedInfo.description: Listen to your favorite news, comedy, sports and talk radio shows on your Android phone or tablet.  Discover the best of NPR, CNN, Fox, BBC, Freakonomics, Adam Carolla, TedTalks, SModcast, Joe Rogan, Rush Limbaugh, Radiolab and over 15,000 shows, podcasts and live radio.  Change the way you listen to radio.WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYINGCNET âStitcher is to news and information what Pandora is to musicâBUSINESS WEEK âMakes Sirius look overpriced and stodgyâ GIZMODO âStitcher collects and stitches together spoken word radio content. Think of it as your local public radio station, times 400â KEY FEATURES:* CREATE CUSTOM STATIONS: âStitchâ together your favorite shows to create customized stations.* DISCOVER NEW SHOWS: Stitcher helps you find new shows youâll love by recommending shows other listeners of the same show also like.* LISTEN ON DEMAND: Get the latest episodes of your favorite shows as soon as they are released, without the hassle of downloading and syncing podcasts. * GET BREAKING NEWS: Keep up with the dayâs biggest stories on the front page and via breaking news audio alerts sent to your phone. * SHARE WITH FRIENDS: Share your favorite shows on Twitter, Facebook and email.Stitcher is the best way to stay connected with the information thatâs important to you. Stitcher Radio is a smarter way to listen to the radio.AWARDS & PRAISE- 20 Best Apps of 2012 - TechCrunch - 25 Top Android Apps - Time 2012 - 12 Best Entertainment Apps of 2012 - PC World - Essential Driving App - Wired 2012 - Best News App - Best App Ever Awards- Best Mobile News App - Webby's People's Voice Award- Top 75 Android Apps - PC Magazine- Top 5 Podcast Apps - Mashable "Best Podcast app ever" Eric"Great, an easy way to keep up on current news" JakeâI Love NPR and CNBC on the goâ SamâUnbeatable, and Iâve tried a few. Like having a real radio in your handâ Cyril âThe best thing about it is having different playlists; one for my morning commute, another for my lunch hour (Joe Rogan!) and another for heading home (This American Life)â Jerry

reviews.title: Ok. But no 2x and offline.
reviews.comment: It\'s still a great app.  But coming from the iOS version, I miss 2x and offline listening.   umano is much newer and it has 2x
reviews.author: Tom Groth

reviews.title: Need offline listening on Android
reviews.comment: Great generally but the time I listen to podcasts the most is when I\'m not connected to Wi-Fi.
reviews.author: GERALD SCHEPENS

reviews.title: Great, but....
reviews.comment: Still the good ol Stitcher we\'re used to, still no f***king \'off\' or \'exit\' button.  WHAT IN THEE HELL?  Pick it up Stitch, you\'re better than that.
reviews.author: Jason Cohen

reviews.title: Can\'t play previous episodes
reviews.comment: For some reason I can\'t play previous episodes. Whenever I select an episode from the list it will play some random past episode. Very frustrating if I miss an episode I can\'t get it back.
reviews.author: Brian Adame

reviews.title: Neat app, no offline on Android
reviews.comment: I like the idea but won\'t be using this until they release offline mode for Android. It\'s been 6 months since it was released for iOS. Time to get with it.
reviews.author: Mark Dunlap

reviews.comment: The best organizer for finding and playing podcasts. The UI is getting more complex as the features are added, but still easy to navigate. My only \'request\' would be if the app would mute all notifications during a listening section.\tV 3.03 A notification WILL MUTE playing audio and must be un-muted manually. Fix please. Nexus 7
reviews.author: Larry Cheney

reviews.title: Loses usability with every update
reviews.comment: I seem to lose a favorite feature at each update, while a lot of boat gets added. The number of steps to listen a podcast grows as well. Where did the \'play all\' button go?!
reviews.author: George C.

reviews.title: Used to love this app...
reviews.comment: When I tap a certain episode of a podcast it plays a different one and I can\'t seem to find a way to play the ones that it randomly wants to skip!
reviews.author: Allison Kahle

reviews.title: What happened
reviews.comment: Update srewed up my favorite app.can i go back before update? Time travel or something cuz u guys messed up dring back old sticher this sucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Needs offline listening and sleep timer functionality.   iOS version is way better.
reviews.author: jeff perry

reviews.title: Great when working
reviews.comment: Originally this app worked great.   Now it crashes for fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Droid X
reviews.comment: Was doing great, now sometimes just stops at random. Or when I pick an episode an old pause (bookmark) point resumes from a different episode
reviews.author: Derrick Barrows

reviews.title: What, no offline?
reviews.comment: What\'s the point of this app on a mobile device if you can\'t download podcasts to listen offline?  I want to be able to listen to BBC podcasts from my phone on my car stereo via bluetooth whilst driving.  I\'ll have to look elsewhere it would appear!   Why oh why did Google ditch Listen?
reviews.author: Damian Scott

reviews.title: Like the variety BUT
reviews.comment: No off or exit and it just causes my phone to die faster. Annoying.
reviews.author: Ester Tataje

reviews.title: Android vs iOS
reviews.comment: iOS version keeps getting new features while android is left out in the rain. Looking for a replacement.
reviews.author: Brandon Deriso

reviews.title: Too unfocused
reviews.comment: This app can\'t decide if it wants to be a magazine, an rss reader, or a podcast reader, and it serves neither purpose adequately. I still recommend BeyondPod for audio feeds.
reviews.author: Matt Ebel

reviews.title: Playing old episodes are buggy
reviews.comment: There\'s still some bugs while trying to play old episodes. It seems to jump around still. I\'m having trouble play yesterday\'s CBS fantasy football podcast
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Regression
reviews.comment: Incoming calls & texts make the app crash. Random restarts and station changes occur. The widget runs like crap, appearing online after a crash and being unable to get back to the menu. Even entering the app from the widget causes crashes. There hasn\'t been a good change to Stitcher in a whole now, unless you\'re counting these crash prompts as progress...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stitcher
reviews.comment: IOS version has advantage over Android in being able to download programs for off line listening.  Otherwise, same wonderful app.  Totally replaces scheduled radio.  I can listen to all my favorite programs when I have the time.(and WiFi access for Android),   This app will reinvigorate radio the way FM did in the 70s and 80s.  Bravo.
reviews.author: Paul Spirn

reviews.title: new bug
reviews.comment: plays an already listened to episode instead of the one you clicked on, glitch doesn\'t go away with restarting the app or clicking the skip/forward button. very annoying, happens with many shows.
reviews.author: Madeleine Angelique Trubetsky
